product.name: Wake In Cloud - Plaid Pillow Cases, 100% Washed Cotton, Buffalo Check Gingham Checkered Farmhouse, Set of 2 Pillowcases Pillow Shams Covers, Gray White, King Size 20x36 Inches
product.description: *Please note: pillow insert is not included. Set Includes 2 x Pillow cases / Cushion covers Easy Care Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry low, do not bleach. Size Information Square - cushion cover 18" x 18" . Standard - pillow case 20" x 26" . King - pillow case 20" x 36" . European - pillow case 26" x 26" . *Please note: pillow insert is not included.
product.bullet_points:
• Plaid Design: Features a classic buffalo check gingham pattern that brings a touch of timeless charm and luxury to your home decor. Ideal for fans of farmhouse style.
• King Size: 2 Pillow Cases 20x36 inches.
• 100% Washed Cotton: Crafted from natural cotton, these pillowcases feature a relaxed, elegantly wrinkled appearance, enhancing your bedroom's comfort and style.
• Thoughtful Details: Envelope closure ensures that the pillow stays securely in place, tuck for a polished look or leave loose for a casual vibe.
• Easy Care: Cleaning is a breeze. Machine wash in cold water on a gentle cycle, then tumble dry on low or let it air dry. Avoid bleach.
